languages.text: "Печаль меня берет при виде добрых клинков и стягов, лежащих без дела. Место им на поле брани, а не в ларцах золоченых".
"Sadness always takes me when I see good steel and banners falling into disuse like this. Their place should be on the field of battle, not inside these gilded chests."
languages.original_text: "Печаль меня берет при виде добрых клинков и стягов, лежащих без дела. Место им на поле брани, а не в ларцах золоченых".

traits.locale_text: "Sadness takes me when I see good steel and banners falling into disuse. Their place is on the field of battle, not inside gilded chests."

"Sadness always takes me when I see good steel and banners falling into disuse like this. Their place should be on the field of battle, not inside these gilded chests."

languages.text: "Mich erfüllt immer Trauer, wenn ich sehe, wie guter Stahl und gute Banner so in Vergessenheit geraten. Sie gehören auf das Schlachtfeld, nicht in diese vergoldeten Truhen."
languages.original_text: "Sadness always takes me when I see good steel and banners falling into disuse like this. Their place should be on the field of battle, not inside these gilded chests."

traits.locale_text: "Mich erfüllt immer Trauer, wenn ich sehe, wie guter Stahl und gute Banner so in Vergessenheit geraten. Sie gehören auf das Schlachtfeld, nicht in diese vergoldeten Truhen."

languages.text: « La tristesse me submerge chaque fois que je vois du bon acier et des étendards laissés ainsi au placard. Leur place est sur le champ de bataille, pas dans ces coffres bardés d'or. »
languages.original_text: "Sadness always takes me when I see good steel and banners falling into disuse like this. Their place should be on the field of battle, not inside these gilded chests."

traits.locale_text: « La tristesse me submerge chaque fois que je vois du bon acier et des étendards laissés ainsi au placard. Leur place est sur le champ de bataille, pas dans ces coffres bardés d'or. »

languages.text: «Siempre me entristezco al ver buen acero y estandartes en desuso como aquí. Su lugar está en el campo de batalla, no estos cofres dorados».
languages.original_text: "Sadness always takes me when I see good steel and banners falling into disuse like this. Their place should be on the field of battle, not inside these gilded chests."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre me entristezco al ver buen acero y estandartes en desuso como aquí. Su lugar está en el campo de batalla, no estos cofres dorados».

languages.text: 「良い鋼鉄や旗がこのように使われなくなるのを見ると、必ず悲しみに襲われる。彼らの居場所は戦場であるべきで、このような金色の箪笥の中ではない」
languages.original_text: "Sadness always takes me when I see good steel and banners falling into disuse like this. Their place should be on the field of battle, not inside these gilded chests."

traits.locale_text: 「良い鋼鉄や旗がこのように使われなくなるのを見ると、必ず悲しみに襲われる。彼らの居場所は戦場であるべきで、このような金色の箪笥の中ではない」

languages.text: “每当我看到这么好的钢铁与旗帜被遗弃在这种地方时，我的心里总是感到悲伤。这些东西本该属于战场，而不是这些闪闪发光的箱子。”
languages.original_text: "Sadness always takes me when I see good steel and banners falling into disuse like this. Their place should be on the field of battle, not inside these gilded chests."

traits.locale_text: “每当我看到这么好的钢铁与旗帜被遗弃在这种地方时，我的心里总是感到悲伤。这些东西本该属于战场，而不是这些闪闪发光的箱子。”

languages.original_text: "Sadness always takes me when I see good steel and banners falling into disuse like this. Their place should be on the field of battle, not inside these gilded chests."

languages.text: "Kaliteli çeliğin ve sancakların böyle terk edilmesi karşısında içimi hep bir hüzün kaplar. Yaldızlı sandıklarda tutulacaklarına savaş alanında hak ettikleri yeri almalılar."
languages.original_text: "Sadness always takes me when I see good steel and banners falling into disuse like this. Their place should be on the field of battle, not inside these gilded chests."
